channel.title: Top ten bands?
channel.description:
Post your top 10 bands and rate them, or people who play music. Not sure if there are any on page 2 but I cba to check. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,45199.0.html]original[/url]
1. Queen (10) 2. Led Zeppelin (10) 3. Guns 'N Roses (9) 4. Nirvana (9) 5. Black Sabbath (8) 6. Jimmy/Jimi Hendrix (7) 7. Nightwish (7) 8. ZZ Top (7) 9. Red hot chilli peppers (6?) 10. Apocalyptica
Rate them 1-10

item.title: Top ten bands?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“SceneXster, post:11, topic:187838”][quote author=bootnecklad link=topic=250506.msg2099405#msg2099405 date=1205110406]
Post your top 10 bands and rate them, or people who play music.
Not sure if there are any on page 2 but I cba to check.
original

  1. Queen (10)
  2. Led Zeppelin (10)
  3. Guns 'N Roses (9)
  4. Nirvana (9)
  5. Black Sabbath (8)
  6. Jimmy/Jimi Hendrix (7)
  7. Nightwish (7)
  8. ZZ Top (7)
  9. Red hot chilli peppers (6?)
  10. Apocalyptica

Rate them 1-10
[/quote] Ah Ah Ah, Dude Forgeting Linkin Park! Do you know how many people are in love with Lp?[/quote]

How can you tell someone what they like. And why would he like them just because others like them.

From the looks of it, he’s not into shitty emo crap music anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Top ten bands?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Last time I made that topic almost noone posted in it

Anyways, here is my top 10:

  1. Finntroll
  2. Ensiferum
  3. Dethklok
  4. Dragonforce (I don’t listen to them that much, but I do love the guitar play)
  5. Children of Bodom
  6. Novembers Doom
  7. Catamenia
  8. Guns N Roses
  9. Black Sabbath
  10. Sonata Arctica

Read full topic

item.title: Top ten bands?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

At the minute…

Norther
Finntroll
Children of Bodom
Old Mans Child
Death
Athiest
Cynic
Pestilence
Kalmah
Dimmu Borgir

In no random order, however if it needs to be in order, Norther at 1 to Dimmu Borgir at 10. I was really into Dimmu Borgir(3k plays according to last.fm), however they seem to have been played less and less since I downloaded the Norther discography.

Read full topic

item.title: Top ten bands?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Not the top ten, but my favorites at the moment, no order really.

Born Of Osiris (9)
All Shall Perish (9)
Emmure (8)
The Devil Wears Prada (10)
For The Fallen Dreams (8)
A Skylit Drive (7)
Taking Back Sunday (10)
Arsonists Get All The Girls (7)
Saosin (NOT Cove Reber shit, that Anthony Green stuff) (10)
They Came As Lions (9)

item.title: Top ten bands?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

  1. Tom Petty (10)
  2. Sam Roberts (9)
  3. Ben Harper (9)
  4. Steve Miller Band (8)
  5. Bob dylan (8)
  6. Sublime (8)
  7. Velvet Revolver (8)
  8. System of a down (7)
  9. Kottonmouth kings (7)
  10. Red hot chilli peppers (7)

There are many other bands I listen to, but usually just a few songs from each.
edit: changed it a bit, now that I looked through my songs.
